DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The predefined generic type of the pile according to function.
IFC4 CHANGE  Attribute made optional. Type information can be provided by IfcRelDefinesByType and IfcPileType.

DocAttribute.Name: ConstructionType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Deprecated.
IFC4 CHANGE  Material profile association capability by means of IfcRelAssociatesMaterial has been added. The attribute ConstructionType should not be used whenever its information can be provided by a material profile set, either associated with the IfcPile object or, if present, with a corresponding instance of IfcPileType.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the PredefinedType attribute is unset (e.g. because an IfcPileType is associated), or the inherited attribute ObjectType shall be provided, if the PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT EXISTS(PredefinedType) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcPileTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcPileTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If this occurrence is defined by a type object, the latter has to be an IfcPileType.
